item.title: Schumer warns any GOP bid to shutter the Department of Education will be DOA in Senate
item.description: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer vows that if Republicans seek to push a bill through the Senate to shutter the Department of Education, "It will ...

item.title: Washington AG joins coalition suing to block Trump's order to dismantle Department of Education
item.description: Washington state has joined 20 other states in a lawsuit to block President Donald Trump's executive order to dismantle the Department of Education.

item.title: Can Congress defund federal courts with key Trump budget process?
item.description: As federal judges issue numerous nationwide orders halting Trump agenda items, Congress is looking for ways to address potential abuses.

item.title: Tennessee bill aims to hold charities liable if migrants they house commit crimes
item.description: A bill introduced in the Tennessee legislature could hold charitable organizations liable if they are caught housing an illegal migrant who commits a ...

item.title: Texas lawmakers consider measure prohibiting SNAP benefits from being used to purchase junk food
item.description: A bill in the Texas legislature would prohibit purchasing junk food, including soda, energy drinks, candy, chips and cookies, with SNAP benefits.
